item.title: 显示HN：可云的Postgres MCP服务器
item.description:
hey hn， i构建了PG-MCP，这是PostgreSQL的模型上下文协议（MCP）服务器，可为LLMS和代理提供结构化架构检查和查询执行。它是多租户，可以通过HTTP/SSE（不是STDIO）功能运行 - 支持来自多个代理的多个数据库连接 - 架构内省：返回表结构，类型，索引和约束；富含来自pg_catalog的描述。 (for well documented databases)- Read-Only Queries: Controlled execution of queries via MCP.- EXPLAIN Tool: Helps smart agents optimize queries before execution.- Extension Plugins: YAML-based plugin system for Postgres extensions (supports pgvector and postgis out of the box).- Server Mode: Spin up the container and it's ready to accept connections at http：// localhost：8000/sse
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=43520953 点：131 ＃评论：51
